name: Chicken Curried Salad
author: sal
summary: Different and delicious.  An interesting combination of ingredients that makes a wonderful salad.
ingredients: 6  boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and diced
2 (14 ounce) cans artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 head lettuce - rinsed, dried and torn
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes
In a large bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise and curry powder
Add the potatoes, chicken, onion and artichoke hearts and mix together until evenly coated
To serve, arrange over a lettuce bed and sprinkle with salt and pepper
